text:
Toronto, Ontario, Canada | Achievers http://www.achievers.com | ONSITE | Developers

My company has built a kick-ass employee recognition platform and we're looking for developers of all shapes and sizes. Please don't apply if you're a jerk though, we don't hire assholes.

He are some of our current requisitions:

Accounting Support

Lead Developer, Automation Test

Senior Software Developer

Senior Technical Consultant

Software Development Lead

Sr. Android Mobile Developer

Full details at http://app.jobvite.com/m?3DeWniwX
